questions.question: Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
